long_description: With conductive material on the thumbs and index fingers, the women's REI Tech-Compatible All-Season gloves keep your hands warm as you send text messages and surf the web on your touch-screen device. Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) hard-face fleece blocks wind up to 8 mph and has good water repellency to shed light snow showers. Silicone pattern on the palms improves your grip in wet conditions. Stretch fabric provides a snug fit proportioned for women's hands; REI Tech-Compatible All-Season gloves can be worn as liners or on their own.
short_description: With conductive material on the thumbs and index fingers, the women's REI Tech-Compatible All-Season gloves keep your hands warm as you send text messages and surf the web on your touch-screen device.
